parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> If loading screen is shown, sets progress bar to the given value (interval is from 0 to 1])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[progressLoadingScreen]] progress

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> progress: [[Number]] - in range 0..1

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[startLoadingScreen]] ["Loading My Mission"];
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>batch of code</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
[[progressLoadingScreen]] 0.25;
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>batch of code</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
[[progressLoadingScreen]] 0.50;
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>batch of code</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
[[progressLoadingScreen]] 0.95;
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>batch of code</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value/></part></template>
[[endLoadingScreen]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[startLoadingScreen]], [[endLoadingScreen]], [[progressPosition]], [[BIS_fnc_progressLoadingScreen]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
